p.codeblock: virtual int startCameraCapture(VIDEO_SOURCE_TYPE sourceType, const CameraCapturerConfiguration& config) = 0;
public abstract int startCameraCapture(Constants.VideoSourceType sourceType, CameraCapturerConfiguration config);

section.p: You can call this method and specify sourceType to start capturing video from one or more cameras.
You can call this method and specify the sourceType to start capturing video from one or more cameras.
section.note: On iOS, if you want to enable multi-camera capture, you must call and set enabled to before calling .
On Android devices, if the device has multiple cameras or supports external cameras, you can capture video from up to 4 cameras.
